sentences.en: Compare sell, vend, peddle , push and flog.
sentences.cn: 试比较sell、vend 、 peddle 、 push、flog这几个词.

sentences.en: Don't try to flog a dead horse.
He was publicly flogged and humiliated.
sentences.cn: 他当众受到鞭打和羞辱。

sentences.en: He would flog her to death with a rubber truncheon.
sentences.cn: 他用橡皮警棍把她活活抽死.

sentences.en: How cruel was the man to flog his own son to death!
sentences.cn: 这个男人竟把自己的亲生儿鞭打死了,多么残忍!

sentences.en: It is nobody's source of income or a commodity to flog around in the market.
sentences.cn: 它不是任何人收入的来源或者被放在市场上的日用品.

sentences.en: Jesus told Peter to feed his sheep not to flog them.
sentences.cn: 耶稣吩咐彼得喂养祂的羊,而不是鞭打它们.

sentences.en: Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers of sailors.
sentences.cn: 今, 鞭笞抗命士兵或水手是人道惩罚.

sentences.en: Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.cn: 现今, 鞭挞不服从的兵士或水手是不人道的惩罚.

sentences.en: The school does not have the authority to flog the student.
sentences.cn: 学校无权鞭打处罚学生.

sentences.en: They are trying to flog their house.
Too many European brands try to flog unpopular models to the Chinese, he says.
sentences.cn: 他表示,太多欧洲品牌都在试图将不流行的款式塞给中国人.

sentences.en: We should be able to flog the car ( to someone ) for a good price.
sentences.cn: 我们应该能把这辆汽车高价卖出.

trans.tran_en: to beat a person or animal with a whip or stick
